trans-unit.source: Represents a control that contains multiple items that share the same space on the screen.
The TabControl is useful for minimizing screen space usage while allowing an application to expose a large amount of data.
A TabControl consists of multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects that share the same screen space.
Only one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> in a TabControl is visible at a time.

When a user selects the tab of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>, the contents of that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> become visible and the contents of the other <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects are hidden.
TabControl is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
Customizing the TabControl Control To apply the same property settings to multiple TabControl controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.

For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
To see the parts and states that are specific to the TabControl, see [TabControl Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
> [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in TabControl control's default template and is set by using a .

You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabControl"></xref>.class.
Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> objects if they are displayed as strings.
ContentStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, the ContentStringFormat property is ignored.
A composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> objects if they are displayed as strings.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat*> dependency property.
To be added.

Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply to any <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> property defined.
## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
*TemplateResourceKey* The key that identifies the template being requested.
The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
> [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply to any <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> property defined.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> that provides custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.

Typically, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> when you have more than one <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to apply based on the properties of each data object.
Note that if you have objects of different types, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
If you do that, then there is no need to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.
Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> or a data converter.
For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element.
If both the ContentTemplateSelector and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> properties are set, then this property is ignored.
## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
*DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to a resource dictionary.
*MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* A class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and overrides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>.
For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A ContentTemplateSelector.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates or identifies the element used to display the specified item.
The element used to display the specified item.
Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""></xref>.
Specified item.

Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is its own <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Called when <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*> is called.

This method updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties to the objects used by the currently selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.

Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabControlAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
The type-specific <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation.
Called when <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized*> is set to **true**.
The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"></xref> event.
Called to update the current selection when items change.
The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"></xref> event.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key.

This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when the user presses CTRL+TAB, CTRL+SHIFT+TAB, HOME, or END to navigate between <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects.
Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> event data.
Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref>.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"></xref> routed event.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties to the objects used by the currently selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
Gets the content of the currently selected <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref>.
This property is updated to reference the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the active <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> when the tab selection changes.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to this property.

If you create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, be sure to the bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to this property by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to "SelectedContent" or by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The content of the currently selected <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the content of the currently selected <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> if it is displayed as a string.
A composite string that specifies how to format the content of the currently selected <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> if it is displayed as a string.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentStringFormat*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> of the currently selected item.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> updates this property to reference to the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for the active <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> when the tab selection changes.

Set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> to specify the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to this property.

If you create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, be sure to the bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to this property by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to "SelectedContent" or by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> of the selected item.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> of the currently selected item.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> updates this property to reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> for the active <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> when the tab selection changes.

Set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to this property.

If you create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, be sure to the bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to this property by setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to "SelectedContent" or by using the [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> of the currently selected item.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets how tab headers align relative to the tab content.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The alignment of tab headers relative to tab content.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Dock"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.TabStripPlacement*> dependency property.
To be added.
